description:
You know that sweatshirt that just feels like home? The one you instinctively grab on cold mornings or when you're needing some extra comfort in your life? This is that sweatshirt (no breaking in necessary).

Prana's Cardiff Fleece Full Zip for men is made with our bestselling Cardiff fabric, featuring a blend of hemp, recycled poly, and Tencel® Lyocell tree fiber. It's soft, breathable, provides the perfect level of warmth, and best of all, is sustainable.

But it's not just soft, it's strong too. They're talking UPF 50+ and odor-reducing properties that fit right in with active lifestyles. To top it all off, it also has front welt pockets (complete with a media port if you need it), a comfy double-layered hood, and a classic standard fit that pairs with everything.
name: Prana Cardiff Fleece Full Zip - Mens
